item.description: week 2-3 Guest Speaker Media Journal assignment Media Placement Exam (MPE)– Next Friday For potential journalism majors. Once you post your material, audiences will interpret in their own ways. Media literary: transforming info into knowledge Law of closure Filter bubble confirmation bias information satisficing All media are constructed with a purpose and a particulur point of view.
